description: Microsoft XNA Game Studio and XNA Game Studio Express are game development programs that experienced developers, students, and hobbyists can use to create games for Windows and the Xbox 360. These programs often package game assets, including .PNG images and .WAV audio files, in XNB files.

Most popularly, the games Terraria and Stardew Valley store some game assets in XNB files. These games' players have created XNB extraction utilities that allow them to extract the images and audio that XNB files contain.
